void Mercury::OnceOffSender::delOnceOffResendTimer ( const Address &  addr,
SeqNum  seq,
NetworkInterface &  networkInterface 
)

This method removes the resend timer associated with a packet sent once-off reliably.

It should be called when receipt of the packet has been acknowledged.

This method is called when a remote process dies.

It allows for resend timers to be cleaned up.
